summary: HomePage hero copy was rewritten to feature “Zero Tolerance for Stalking.” and “Document It All.” plus a women-centered, legal/accountability-focused AI support paragraph. Two additional non-product files (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json) were also updated. There is a likely acceptance-criteria risk around the requirement for the exact slogan text due to added punctuation/capitalization.

missing_requirements.requirement: The landing page prominently displays the exact text “Document it all” and the exact text “Zero Tolerance for Stalking”.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero headline includes “Zero Tolerance for Stalking.” and “Document It All.” with trailing periods and different capitalization; the AC calls for the exact text strings without extra punctuation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state documentation (project_state.json) describing expanded app features.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update landing page hero copy/slogans and keep auth flow intact; it does not request changing repository state documentation.
BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summary artifacts—only landing page copy changes.
